Subject: Re: Megatron's agenda
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron was crossing the Atlantic ocean towards the strange energy signals
he was receiving. They where from the futur, about 2008, the end of the
Great War, it must be from what ever that fireball was, he mused. If it
contains power he must have it. His eyes glowed, as he flew forward,
towards a group of Islands.
